alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:28PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila and Pinal Counties through 515 PM MST... At 428 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Cutter to 10 miles south of Globe to near Top-Of-The-World to near Miami. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Globe, Superior, Miami, Central Heights-Midland City, Top-Of-The-World, Claypool and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 226 and 246. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 149 and 167. AZ Route 177 between mile markers 166 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Superior; Tonto Basin
